Source code for everyclass.config.production

from .default import Config
import git



[docs]class ProductionConfig(Config):
    # Basic config
    CONFIG_NAME = 'production'
    DEBUG = False
    SECRET_KEY = '9*+X{fW^d@62uNHeFXEArkcAh'

    # CDN settings
    CDN_DOMAIN = 's2.tail0r.com'

    # Git hash
    _repo = git.Repo(search_parent_directories=True)
    GIT_HASH = _repo.head.object.hexsha

    # Sentry
    SENTRY_CONFIG = {
        'dsn': 'https://7eac20ef24f2478081bcc89c25a8472a:420fefc7e03f48b395f3728255214360@sentry.io/203385',
        'release': GIT_HASH
    }

    # HTML minify
    HTML_MINIFY = True

    # Static file settings
    STATIC_VERSIONED = True

    # Database config
    MYSQL_CONFIG = {
        'user': 'ecA4_user',
        'password': 'cVN5Wdz63bVEWm',
        'host': '127.0.0.1',
        'port': '3306',
        'database': 'ecA4',
        'raise_on_warnings': True,
    }
